Example: author = {Doe, John and Smith, Jane} → AU - Doe, John / AU - Smith, Jane
title = {A Study of Citations} → TI - A Study of Citations
journal = {Revista de Ciencia Avanzada} → JO - Revista de Ciencia Avanzada
keywords = {citation, formats} → KW - citation / KW - formats

Description: ISBN for books (same tag as ISSN).

Example: abstract={Large language models (LLMs) are rapidly being adopted in healthcare.} →AB  - Large language models (LLMs) are rapidly being adopted in healthcare.
The identifier in BibTeX appears after the first curly brace “{”, it does not have a specif tag @article{juan2025 → ID - juan2025
